name: Ghost With a Beating Heart
description: Inspired by Egyptian afterlife beliefs, Dante’s “Inferno,” “The Wizard of Oz,”  the Romanian fairytales of Bau Bau and games like Undertale, this modern telling of the Afterlife finally came into fruition. It includes creatures such as Bennu, Ammit The Devourer, a Sphinx full of riddles, and gods like Bes and Anubis. As you and your dog are swallowed by a ghost, can you rescue your pup before you lose your memory of your world and those you love? Guided by rules of the Afterlife, you make your way to the Hall of Final Judgment, where your heart will be weighed.
